title: Ward skin with different name and bug.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Something new about fixing this problem i lost 2 skins to perma my ward skin and still i cant use it.

replies.body: Rest easy knowing that this is just a visual issue!  Some ward skins aren't selectable due to a bug, but they are unlocked on the account.  There's no eta on a fix, but I hope that helps clear things up!
